Name: Phantom EEG Data and Scripts
ReferencesAndLinks: Downey, R.J.; Ferris, D.P. iCanClean Removes Motion, Muscle, Eye, and Line-Noise Artifacts from Phantom EEG. Sensors 2023, 23, 8214. https://doi.org/10.3390/s23198214
